segment.source: How to Change the Server Cache Size
segment.target: How to Change the Server Cache Size

segment.source: How to Change the Server Cache Size
segment.target: How to Change the Server Cache Size

segment.source: How to Change the Server Cache Size
segment.target: How to Change the Server Cache Size

segment.source: You can use the following procedure to change the cache size for any server directly from the Application Virtualization Server Management Console.
segment.target: You can use the following procedure to change the cache size for any server directly from the Application Virtualization Server Management Console.

segment.source: Although you can change the cache size, unless your configuration specifically requires you to change the size, it is recommended that you leave the cache size set to the default values.
segment.target: Although you can change the cache size, unless your configuration specifically requires you to change the size, it is recommended that you leave the cache size set to the default values.

segment.source: To change the server cache size
segment.target: To change the server cache size

segment.source: Click the Server Groups node in the left pane to expand the list of server groups.
segment.target: Click the Server Groups node in the left pane to expand the list of server groups.

segment.source: In the Results pane, double-click the desired server group to display the list of servers in the group.
segment.target: In the Results pane, double-click the desired server group to display the list of servers in the group.

segment.source: In the Results pane, right-click the desired server and select Properties.
segment.target: In the Results pane, right-click the desired server and select Properties.

segment.source: Enter a value in the Maximum Memory Allocation field for the server cache, and enter a value for the threshold warning level in the Warn Memory Allocation field.
segment.target: Enter a value in the Maximum Memory Allocation field for the server cache, and enter a value for the threshold warning level in the Warn Memory Allocation field.

segment.source: Enter a value in the Maximum Block Size field.
segment.target: Enter a value in the Maximum Block Size field.

segment.source: This number must be greater than or equal to the maximum block size of the largest package that will be streamed from the server.
segment.target: This number must be greater than or equal to the maximum block size of the largest package that will be streamed from the server.

segment.target: How to Change the Server Port
